result:
We need your voice on the marijuana legalization. We welcome your on-topic commentary, criticism, and expertise.

Please follow our guidelines to ensure everyone has a positive experience, and please help us moderate by reporting any inappropriate posts.

Don't make false statements, defame, or impersonate someone else.
Don't copy and post others' material, trademarks, or intellectual property.
Comments shouldn't harass, abuse, or threaten anyone's personal safety or property.
Don't post profanity, obscenities, abusive language, or otherwise objectionable content.

* We are not responsible or liable in any way for comments posted by its users.
